description: Assist with feeding, grooming, and caring for animals. Ensure the animals are healthy and comfortable.
Help veterinarians with animal check-ups, administer medications, and maintain health records.
Organize events to raise awareness about pet adoption and help coordinate fundraising efforts.
Manage volunteer schedules, conduct orientation sessions, and assist in volunteer recruitment.
Ensure the cleanliness and maintenance of the facility, including cleaning kennels, grounds, and equipment.
